examples: The museum is a fascinating place to learn about history and art.
The monkey's intelligence and adaptability made it a fascinating creature to study.
I find it fascinating to learn about the wonders of the natural world through science.
This meeting was fascinating.
Today's question is fascinating.
words.defineVi: cực kỳ thú vị hoặc quyến rũ

examples: I'm always fascinated.
I am just fascinated by fluid dynamics, ballistics, optics, mechanics, aerodynamics.
In the early 1800s, he became fascinated with human digestion especially our urine.
And I'm fascinated with that stuff.
During an ocean voyage to the United States, he became fascinated with ocean invertebrates, admiring their glass-like colors and shapes.
words.defineEn: having a strong interest and curiosity in something
words.defineVi: có một sự quan tâm mạnh mẽ và sự tò mò trong một cái gì đó

examples: This stadium has seen many thrilling football games.
It's a thrilling movie that keeps audiences on the edge of their seats.
It's so thrilling seeing her holding her head high after all those people tried to bring her down.
This thrilling deep-sea fish was voted the world's ugliest animal by the Ugly Animal Preservation Society.
That was a thrilling moment.
words.defineVi: gây ra niềm vui lớn hoặc phấn khích

examples: They're thrilled about starting a family.
After months of planning, I'm thrilled that the event is finally at hand!
The bride and groom were both thrilled with how everything turned out.
After hiking all day without any food, the hikers were thrilled to come across a roadside stand selling hot dogs.
The Smiths were thrilled to have a pigeon pair, as they had always dreamed of having both a son and a daughter.
words.defineEn: very excited, happy, or pleased about something
words.defineVi: rất vui mừng, hạnh phúc, hoặc hài lòng về một cái gì đó

examples: They are frightening the daylights out of people.
It’s a very frightening situation, but we mustn’t lose our heads.
It's frightening, how often her mind is blank.
They never watch scary movies because they find them too frightening.
The vibrations are frightening.
words.defineVi: khiến người ta cảm thấy sợ hãi

examples: As frightened as I am to die, I'm also curious to know what it's like beyond the veil.
The villagers are very frightened of his ghost.
Mr Edgar looked very frightened.
I was kind of frightened.
I was definitely frightened.
words.defineVi: cảm thấy sợ hãi hoặc lo lắng

examples: Scorpion was disgusting rehearsal.
That's disgusting.
This is disgusting.
- That's disgusting.
- It looks disgusting.
words.defineEn: describing something that is very unpleasant
words.defineVi: mô tả một cái gì đó là rất khó chịu

examples: This article crossed a line and I am disgusted.
I was disgusted.
He was probably just an ordinaryperson who was so disgusted at what he had seen for the lastfew days.
Some lady just walked down the hallway and opened up a window and cast a very disgusted look into our lab.
I went there first as a college student and later as a journalist, and I was amazed, I was dazzled, and I was disgusted.
words.defineEn: having or displaying great dislike for something
words.defineVi: có hoặc hiển thị rất không thích cho một cái gì đó
